title: A Touch of hands (TEFC)
creator_credit: James T. Crawford and University of Pittsburgh
brief_description: Documentary on expressive arts therapist, Ed Lilley’s work with a group of emotionally handicapped children as they prepare a puppet show. The children are shown playing group games, preparing the puppets and set, rehearsing and finally performing their show. The aim of this therapy is to allow the children to extend themselves and improve their self images
